mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notifications (user_id, document_id, message, is_read, created_at) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{documentId}, #{message}, #{isRead}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, document_id, message, is_read, created_at FROM notifications WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, user_id, document_id, message, is_read, created_at FROM notifications WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_read = 0 ORDER BY created_at DESC

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notifications WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_read = 0
